thread.title: Sixpoint Partners Continues Expansion with Key Project Management Hire; Appoints Alex Lorusso as Vice President

author: cnbc.com
title: Sixpoint Partners Continues Expansion with Key Project Management Hire; Appoints Alex Lorusso as Vice President

organizations.name: goldman sachs’ equity capital markets division

text:
Former Goldman Sachs and Merrill Lynch Banker to Join Sixpoint’s Project Management Team
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Sixpoint Partners, the leading advisor serving the middle-market private equity industry, today announced the appointment of Alex Lorusso as Vice President. In his new role, Mr. Lorusso will be responsible for project management and due diligence efforts in the primary markets.
Having worked in capital markets for almost a decade in a variety of roles, Mr. Lorusso brings extensive experience in delivering advice and executing equity and debt fundraising transactions. Prior to joining Sixpoint, Mr. Lorusso was a Vice President in Goldman Sachs’ Equity Capital Markets Division, where he assisted in originating, structuring and executing equity capital raises via Initial Public Offerings and Follow-On Offerings for public and private companies.
“We are pleased to welcome Alex to our team and are confident that he will be a valuable addition to the franchise,” said Eric Zoller, Founder & Partner. “Sixpoint has developed a dominant position serving middle market sponsors across the globe and we are committed to over-resourcing every mandate to ensure maximum client service. Our dual focus of delivering strategic advice and successful outcomes with high velocity ensures that every client spends less time fundraising and more time focused on investing.”
“Sixpoint is proud to have a deep bench of talent and world-class project management capabilities” added Larry Smith, Partner of Sixpoint Partners. “Alex will be a superb addition to this team and will certainly bolster our capabilities as a firm to deliver the high level of service our clients have come to expect. Furthermore, it is clear that he is a great cultural fit for the firm and we look forward to his contributions in the coming years.”
About Sixpoint Partners
Sixpoint Partners is a leading global advisor focused on a diversified set of services and solutions for the middle-market private equity industry. The firm’s core areas of focus include (i) primary fund placement and advisory, (ii) secondaries placement and advisory and (iii) co-investment placement across a wide range of industries, strategies and geographies. Sixpoint Partners has a reputation for its direct, results-driven style and for delivering innovative solutions to complex problems in order to create long-term value for clients. Sixpoint is headquartered in New York with offices in Chicago, San Francisco, Austin and Hong Kong. For more information, please visit http://www.sixpointpartners.com/ .
Sixpoint Partners, LLC, is a registered broker/dealer, member FINRA ( http://www.finra.org ) and SIPC ( http://www.sipc.org ). Sixpoint Partners Asia Limited is licensed by the Securities and Futures Commission ( http://www.sfc.hk ).
